msg: SOLR-7135: Allow the server build.xml 'sync-hack' target to by skipped by specifying a system property.

author: markt
msg: Limit concurrent read/write for HTTP upgrade to implementations that
explicitly request it via a Tomcat specific interface. Note that the
expectation is that concurrent read/writes will be replaced by these
implementations having direct access to Tomcat's I/O layer.

author: markt
msg: Remove upgradeInit code as the code that called it has been removed
